name: nutrient supply from poultry manure, fresh | organic potassium fertiliser, as K2O | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/23807/documentation

This inventory describes the supply of nutrients from ''poultry manure, fresh'' for fertiliser use.;No machinery expenditures or emissions to the environment are considered related to the actual application of this substance on soil during its agricultural use. The purpose of this activity is to connect the chemical production of ''poultry manure, fresh'' with its generic uses as fertilizer. The product ''poultry manure, fresh'' is connected to the generic market for 'organic nitrogen fertiliser, as N' and 'organic phosphorus fertiliser, as P2O5' and 'organic potassium fertiliser, as K2O' through this supplying activity. In the agricultural context, ''poultry manure, fresh'' can be used directly as a fertilizer input to crop production, eventually with other chemicals; alternatively, a generic input of 'organic nitrogen fertiliser, as N' and 'organic phosphorus fertiliser, as P2O5' and 'organic potassium fertiliser, as K2O' can be used instead, and this will represent the regional consumption mix for his type of nutrient. A way in between is allowed by using the generic input 'organic nitrogen fertiliser, as N' and 'organic phosphorus fertiliser, as P2O5' and 'organic potassium fertiliser, as K2O' and link to the activity providing it from a specific chemical.;In all cases, emissions associated to the application of the fertilizer have to be calculated in the crop production activity.

This inventory describes the supply of nutrients from ''poultry manure, fresh'' for fertiliser use.

No machinery expenditures or emissions to the environment are considered related to the actual application of this substance on soil during its agricultural use.
category: A:Agriculture, forestry and fishing/01:Crop and animal production, hunting and related service activities/016:Support activities to agriculture and post-harvest crop activities/0161:Support activities for crop production

processDocumentation.technologyDescription: Inventory based on composition of ''poultry manure, fresh''.

exchanges.description: Literature data. Data compilation for nutrient content by Riedener, E. Agroscope, LCA Group, 2015, sources FAOSTAT (average of years 2009-2012), SALCA-Field_V1.3a and GRUDAF 2009. Results reported in Nemecek T., Bengoa X., Lansche J., Mouron P., Riedener E., Rossi V. & Humbert S. (2015) Methodological Guidelines for the Life Cycle Inventory of Agricultural Products. Version 3.0, July 2015. World Food LCA Database (WFLDB). Quantis and Agroscope, Lausanne and Zurich, Switzerland. Information on heavy metals from Freiermuth 2006 from from Menzi & Kessler (1998) and Desaules & Studer (1993, p. 152)). Dry matter from Walther et al. (2001). In Nemecek T. & Schnetzer J. (2011) Methods of assessment of direct field emissions for LCIs of agricultural production systems. Data v3.0 (2012). Accessible in the database report section under the name '01 crop production-direct field emissions natural resources v1.2.pdf'. References: FAOSTAT (2009-2012), Available at http://faostat.fao.org/ Desaules A. & Studer K. 1993. Nationales Bodenbeobachtungsnetz – Messresultate 1985-1991. Schriftenreihe Umwelt Nr. 200. Bundesamt für Umwelt, Wald und Landschaft (Hrsg.), CH-3003 Bern. Freiermuth R. (2006) Modell zur Berechnung der Schwermetallflüsse in der Landwirtschaftlichen Ökobilanz. Agroscope FAL Reckenholz, 42 p., Available at http://www.agroscope.admin.ch/oekobilanzen/01194/ Menzi & Kessler (1998) Heavy metal contents of livestock feeds and animal manures in England and Wales. Bioresource Technology, 70, pp. 23-31 Nemecek T., Bengoa X., Lansche J., Mouron P., Riedener E., Rossi V. & Humbert S. (2015) Methodological Guidelines for the Life Cycle Inventory of Agricultural Products. Version 3.0, July 2015. World Food LCA Database (WFLDB). Quantis and Agroscope, Lausanne and Zurich, Switzerland. Nemecek T. & Schnetzer J. (2011) Methods of assessment of direct field emissions for LCIs of agricultural production systems. Data v3.0 (2012) SALCA-Field_V1.3a, Available at http://www.agroscope.admin.ch/oekobilanzen/01199/08127/index.html?lang=en GRUDAF 2009, Available at http://www.agroscope.admin.ch/aktuell/00198/00199/00344/04683/index.html?lang=fr&msg-id=25488 Walther U., J.P. Ryser und R. Flisch: Grundlagen für die Düngung im Acker- und Futterbau 200. Agrarforsching, 8 (6), pp. 1-80.
